review: I decided to try this because I basically got it for free. I have 2 Roku streaming sticks and wanted to see how the Fire TV Stick compared. Overall it is a disappointment. The interface is clumsy and it is slow. One of my wife's and my biggest gripes is that to activate and deactivate the parental control, you must log in to you Amazon account via computer to enable and disable. This is absurd. The power/USB cable plugs into the side rather than the back end which gets in the way of plugging it into some TVs. Amazon provides a 3 inch HDMI adapter for such instances, but why not just design it properly in the first place. overall, I would not by one of these. You are better off with a Roku or Apple TV.
